data_table.description: Subject ID, consent group, subject source, and source subject ID of participants with or without tobacco use disorder and involved in the "CIDR, NCI, NIDA Sequencing of Targeted Genomic Regions Associated with Smoking" project.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects
